main.name: Louise Hayes
main.description: I am always learning, having fun with code, creating apps to enhance life, with a focus on modern frameworks, accessibility and PWA's
main.bio: My career has brought me all over the world, from Sydney in Auzzie to Dungarvan, Ireland and now Portsmouth NH, in U.S.

education.description: I learned to create accessible apps & PWA's in the MERN stack, making Open Source contributions and integrating with AI
A highly practical computer science course, a fantastic grounding in functional programming concepts and practical coding skills.
